title: Addition Upto Crore
image_desc: - [Image Description in English only: A colorful image of numbers 1 to 10, with a playful design.]
narration: Welcome! Today, we're going to learn about addition up to crore. This is a crucial skill for understanding large numbers and performing calculations in everyday life.

title: Understanding Place Value
content: - **Ten Thousands Place:** Represents ten thousands (10,000, 20,000, 30,000, etc.)
- **Ten Lakhs Place:** Represents ten lakhs (1,000,000, 2,000,000, 3,000,000, etc.)
image_desc: - [Image Description in English only: An image of a place value chart with numbers and their corresponding place values.]
narration: Before we start adding, let's understand place value.  Numbers are organized in groups of ten, starting with the units place.  Each place value represents a power of ten.  For example, the thousands place represents 10 x 10 x 10, or 1000.

title: Adding Numbers Up to Crore
content: - **Step 1:** Align the numbers vertically, ensuring that the units place, tens place, and so on, are in the same column.
- **Step 2:** Add the digits in each place value column, starting from the units place.
- **Step 3:** If the sum in a column exceeds 9, carry over the tens digit to the next place value column.
- **Step 4:** Continue adding each place value column, carrying over as needed.
image_desc: - [Image Description in English only: An image showing a vertical addition problem with numbers aligned by place value, with the sum below.]
narration: Adding numbers up to crore is like building a tower with blocks. We start by aligning the numbers vertically, ensuring that the units place, tens place, and so on, are in the same column. Then, we add the digits in each place value column, starting from the units place. If the sum in a column exceeds 9, we carry over the tens digit to the next place value column. We continue this process for each place value column, carrying over as needed.

title: Practice Makes Perfect
image_desc: - [Image Description in English only: An image of a person working on a math problem, with a calculator and pencil.]
narration: Now it's time to practice! Try adding these numbers. Remember to align them properly and carry over when needed. Don't worry if you make mistakes, practice is key to mastering addition up to crore.

title: Conclusion
content: - You've learned about place value and how to add numbers up to crore.
image_desc: - [Image Description in English only: An image of a person smiling and holding up a "100%" sign, representing success.]
narration: Congratulations! You've learned about place value and how to add numbers up to crore. Remember, practice is key to mastering this skill. Keep practicing and you'll be a pro in no time!
